nodes.text: Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections: The Classic Trilogy

Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections: The Classic Trilogy is a hardcover reference book published by Dorling Kindersley in 2012 as part of the Star Wars: The Complete Vehicle Cross-Sections and Blueprints box set. The text serves as a reprinting of the original Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections (1998), which was also collected in Star Wars: Complete Cross-Sections (2007).
